data.title: Web Hosting Services by the No.1 Web Hosting Provider: $5.95
data.meta_description: Web Hosting Services by the No.1 Web Hosting Provider: $5.95/mo, FREE domain registration, 500GB space, 5000GB traffic.
data.text:
General Description

SiteGround.com was founded in August 2003 by an enthusiastic team of IT professionals. Since then, the company is constantly growing both in number of employees and clients. Since the last several years, we have become one of the most preferred hosting providers, serving more than 50,000 websites. Our success is due to our profound technical expertise and unmatched quality of customer care.

Our Datacenter

SiteGround Datacenter: Our servers are located in Houston, Texas, USA, which is one of the biggest datacenters in the World. After careful investigation, we have chosen this data-centers as it proved to be among the most reliable in the USA.

Tikiwiki hosting

SiteGround hosts more than 5,000 wiki sites and offers wiki-optimized servers, free domain name registration and rich feature set. With SiteGround you will finally find a home for your website!

Current status of one-click installations

As of December 2023, Siteground's app installer offers only MediaWiki and Moodle, not Tiki. Siteground's AI bot says, "We do not use Fantastico for one-click installations."
